resources.string: I have read and I accept
Sorry, the introduced email is not valid...
You do not have any metric stored
Acceptance: By using or accessing our Android sports app ("App"), you agree to these Terms and Conditions ("Terms").
Eligibility: You must be at least 13 years old to use the App.
License: We grant you a personal, non-commercial, non-transferable, and revocable license to use the App, subject to these Terms.
Registration: You may be required to register for an account to access certain features. You must provide accurate information and keep it up to date.
User Conduct: You agree to use the App responsibly and legally, and not to engage in any behavior that may harm others or disrupt the App functionality.
Privacy: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy, which explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

Intellectual Property: All content, design, and functionality of the App are protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws. You may not copy, modify, or distribute any portion of the App without our express permission.
Third-Party Content: The App may contain links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for their content or practices.
In-App Purchases: The App may offer in-app purchases. All sales are final, and we do not offer refunds or exchanges.
Limitation of Liability: We will not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the App, to the fullest extent permitted by law.
Disclaimer: The App is provided "as is" and "as available," without warranties of any kind, express or implied.
Indemnification: You agree to indemnify and hold us harmless from any claims or damages arising from your use of the App.
Termination: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to the App for any reason, without notice.
Changes to Terms: We may update these Terms at any time. Your continued use of the App constitutes acceptance of any changes.
Governing Law: These Terms are governed by the laws of the jurisdiction where our company is registered, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
Dispute Resolution: Any disputes arising from these Terms shall be resolved through negotiation or, if necessary, binding arbitration.
Contact: If you have questions or concerns about these Terms, please contact us at [support email].
Entire Agreement: These Terms, together with our Privacy Policy, constitute the entire agreement between you and us regarding your use of the App.
Severability: If any provision of these Terms is deemed invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect.
Waiver: Our failure to enforce any right or provision of these Terms will not be considered a waiver of those rights.
